items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible dependency injection container designed to manage object lifetimes and resolve dependencies efficiently in JavaScript applications.
items.title: sagifire/di-container: A lightweight and flexible dependency injection container designed to manage object lifetimes and resolve dependencies efficiently in JavaScript applications.

items.content_html: lightweight plugin for Express users who want to connect to QueryGuard
items.title: celesterock/queryguard-express-agent: lightweight plugin for Express users who want to connect to QueryGuard

items.content_html: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.
items.title: letmaker/liko: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript.  Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI.  Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.

items.content_html: Dynamic lightweight modal dialog written in vanilla JavaScript.
items.title: noen/modaljs: Dynamic lightweight modal dialog written in vanilla JavaScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.
items.title: hhmm134/canvas-sheet: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

items.content_html: Froovo is a modern, modular, ultra-lightweight web server written in TypeScript. Designed to deliver exceptional performance with a clean and flexible framework, it is ideal for modern APIs, real-time services and high-performance web applications.
items.title: Saruro/Froovo: Froovo is a modern, modular, ultra-lightweight web server written in TypeScript. Designed to deliver exceptional performance with a clean and flexible framework, it is ideal for modern APIs, real-time services and high-performance web applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight and performant react-redux utilities that would help reduce the size of your codebase for creating redux boilerplate. As a result, your codebase would be easy to maintain as it fully utilizes typescript from creating redux contexts (reducers, actions, selectors) to your react component (consuming state, dispatching action).
items.title: jovenlumaas/react-redux-methods: A lightweight and performant react-redux utilities that would help reduce the size of your codebase for creating redux boilerplate. As a result, your codebase would be easy to maintain as it fully utilizes typescript from creating redux contexts (reducers, actions, selectors) to your react component (consuming state, dispatching action).

items.title: marqo-ai/shopify-marqo-connector:  A lightweight repo for managing document updates in Shopify

items.content_html: A lightweight tool for analyzing .env files.
items.title: gurelyusuf/dotenv-analyzer: A lightweight tool for analyzing .env files.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
items.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: This development environment supports a lightweight proxy server system that manages search functionality between Seattle University's frontend applications and Funnelback's search services.
items.title: vicchimenti/funnelback-proxy-dev: This development environment supports a lightweight proxy server system that manages search functionality between Seattle University's frontend applications and Funnelback's search services.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.
items.title: vuhuuu11/react-accordion: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.

items.content_html: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.
items.title: Jonatansilx/RiftJS: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.

items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
items.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Frontend: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.
items.title: alaa-eddine/PineTS: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.

items.content_html: Lightweight event tracking SDK for Node.js services. Capture and send structured, contextual events from backend applications, microservices, and job runners to Vectry Analytics.
items.title: vectry-analytics/vectry-node: Lightweight event tracking SDK for Node.js services. Capture and send structured, contextual events from backend applications, microservices, and job runners to Vectry Analytics.

items.content_html: Pulse is a lightweight JavaScript framework that enhances your HTML rather than replacing it.
items.title: fnando/pulse: Pulse is a lightweight JavaScript framework that enhances your HTML rather than replacing it.
